description:
Did you ever wish to play the drums whenever you want and wherever you are? But your drumset was just too big for your pocket? Well, maybe the Touchpad is also too big for your pocket, but at least you can have it with you wherever you are. And guess what, now your wish finally comes true: play the drums on your tablet!

With Natural Drums HD, the Touchpad optmized version of our award winning "Natural Drums" app is now available. Now you've got the possibility to carry it all with you and enjoy playing a complete drumset with beautiful, rendered graphics, visual feedback and high fidelity sounds no matter where!

Oh, and don't forget to check out the hihat: it works like a real one and looks just gorgeous!
